incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Karabakh Telecom Network in Armenia

incident_updates.body: We are still investigating an issue with SMS delivery failures to Karabakh Telecom Network in Armenia. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We're seeing recovery in receiving message delivery reports to US Mobile network carriers from a subset of short codes. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
